attributes.action: facilitate more individually built housing in England, and allow less gerry-built, all-but identical, big developer produced, nodescript housing taking over our country.  Local Councils need to make it easier for individuals to get planning permission.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see more individually built housing in England, and less gerry-built, all-but identical, big developer produced, nodescript housing to take over our country.  Local councils need to make it easier for individuals to get planning permission.
